name: Molly Bailey
text: Very quick and the order is always right. I got 1 thing I didn't like (promotional item) and they refunded my money quickly and easily.

name: Jacob Jergensen
text: Ordered the day of the superbowl and paid for cheesy breadsticks and only got breadsticks and than today i ordered wings and fries and got this pathetic amount of fries. Not going ever again.

name: Brandi Cheever
text: I've been in Augusta for 10 weeks for work. This is the best pizza hut I've ever had. Every order has been perfect. Today, I ordered a stuffed crust. Its literally the best I've ever eaten. This is by far the best pizza hut.

name: Thomas Austin
text: Good service. A nice place for some good pizza. The staff was pretty friendly and very quick. Food was good quality, but wouldn't recommend coming on a daily basis if you value your paycheck.

name: RhondaG Designs Rhonda G Wellman
text: Thanks for a great pizza. Sense you guys didnt over brown it, I was able to slide it in the broiler and make it brown to my preference.  🙂

name: Ryan Twedell
text: Pizza Hut of Augusta KS is a joke! Jared was the manager on duty during my most recent visit. He was absolutely rude, unprofessional and was not willing to do anything to resolve the issue that occurred during my visit. He has no business …More

text: They fill your pop to the brim....which pisses me off...im just glad my blood pressure was down...i would have had a meeting with the kids that work there and told them the reasons that you don't fill the pop to the brim... You would have thought the parents would have covered that one for me.

text: Love me some pizza! As far as I've tried, their point system is probably the best. 2 points a dollar is fantastic. Domino's only gives you 10 points for anything over $10. Keep it up!
